Package DAO

Class appointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.appointmentsDAO
public class appointmentsDAO extends Object
The type Appointments dao. This class contains methods used to access the appointments table in the database.

    • getApptsByCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptsByCustomer(Customer selectedCustomer)
      Gets appts by customer. This method gets all appointments for a specific customer from the database. It uses a lambda expression to simplify the code used to filter all appointments by customer ID.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - the selected customer
      Returns:
      the appts by customer
